title: Between the Scenes - Trevor Talks About Trump and the Shooting in New Zealand
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - Trevor Talks About Trump and the Shooting in New Zealand
description:
Trevor disagrees with people who believe President Trump is to blame for the mass shooting in New Zealand and explains that both are products of white supremacy. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
